session1.name: Organize & Schedule training on social empowerment sessions: Session 1 - Emotional Self Awareness
session1.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Emotional Self Awareness training session for participant.

session2.name: Organize & Schedule training on social empowerment sessions: Session 2 - Self Management
session2.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Self Management training session for participant.

session3.name: Organize & Schedule training on social empowerment sessions: Session 3 - Relationships
session3.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Relationship training session for participant.

session4.name: Organize & Schedule training on social empowerment sessions: Session 4 - Social Awareness
session4.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Social Awareness training session for participant.

session5.name: Organize & Schedule training on social empowerment sessions: Session 5 - Communication Skills
session5.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Communication Skills training session for participant.

session6.name: Organize & Schedule training on social empowerment sessions: Session 6 - Time Setting
session6.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Time Setting training session for participant.

session7.name: Organize & Schedule training on social empowerment sessions: Session 7 - Family Support
session7.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Family Support training session for participant.

session8.name: Organize & Schedule training on social empowerment sessions: Session 8 - Positive Family Communication
session8.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Positive Family Communication training session for participant.

session9.name: Organize & Schedule training on social empowerment sessions: Session 9 - Parent's involvement in schooling
session9.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Parent's involvement in schooling training session for participant.

session1.name: Organize and schedule business skills training: Session 1 - Business idea
session1.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Business Idea training session for participant.

session2.name: Organize and schedule business skills training: Session 2 - Business finances
session2.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Business Finances training session for participant.

session3.name: Organize and schedule business skills training: Session 3 - Marketing and Communications
session3.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize Marketing and Communications training session for participant.

session4.name: Organize and schedule business skills training: Session 4 - Formalization
session4.description: Coordinate with service provider to schedule and organize business Formalization training session for participant.

generateBusinessIdea.name: Generate Business Idea
generateBusinessIdea.description: Work with participant to develop and document their business idea with clear description, target market, and value proposition.

openBankAccount.name: Support participants to open a bank account (if they don't have)
openBankAccount.description: Assist participant in opening a bank account for their business finances if they do not already have one.

getBusinessLicense.name: Support participants to get a business license
getBusinessLicense.description: Support participant in obtaining necessary business license and registration.

developBusinessPlan.name: Support participants to develop and submit a formal business plan/application to relevant service provider (if they don't have)
developBusinessPlan.description: Assist participant in developing a comprehensive business plan and submitting application to relevant funding or support providers.

approvalBusinessPlan.name: Approval of business development plan from relevant authorities
approvalBusinessPlan.description: Ensure business development plan receives approval from relevant authorities and service providers.

procureAssets.name: Procure productive enterprise assets
procureAssets.description: Support participant in procuring necessary productive assets and equipment for their business.

ensureBusinessAssets.name: Ensure that business assets and resources are provided to the participant
ensureBusinessAssets.description: Verify and facilitate delivery of business assets and resources to participant.

businessTraining.name: Arrange linkages with service providers for business training if required
businessTraining.description: Connect participant with appropriate service providers for additional business training as needed.

businessMentoring.name: Arrange linkages with service providers for business mentoring if required
businessMentoring.description: Establish connections with qualified business mentors and service providers for ongoing support.

businessLinkages.name: Arrange linkages for business (Inputs, Market, Tools etc.) wherever required
businessLinkages.description: Facilitate connections for business inputs, market access, tools, and other resources as required.

monitorBusiness.name: Monitor business in accordance with the digital platform
monitorBusiness.description: Track and monitor business progress using the digital platform and reporting tools.

createRecord.name: Create Ad hoc livelihoods support records when required in the DPG
createRecord.description: Create additional livelihood support records in the digital platform as needed based on participant requirements.

assessmentSurveys.title: Assessment Surveys
assessmentSurveys.noSurveysDescription: There are no assessment surveys available for this participant at this time.

householdProfile.title: Household Profile
householdProfile.description: Comprehensive household profiling information including household composition, human capital, economic activities, and development goals.

midlineSurvey.title: Midline Survey
midlineSurvey.additionalInfo: All sections are mandatory for completion

graduationReadiness.title: Graduation Readiness Survey
graduationReadiness.description: Complete the graduation readiness assessment to issue certificate
graduationReadiness.additionalInfo: Submit survey to generate and issue graduation certificate

endlineSurvey.title: Endline Survey
endlineSurvey.description: Final assessment at Month 24 milestone (Graduation Readiness)

actions.dropoutMessage: Mark {{name}} as dropout from the program
actions.dropoutHint: This will change the participant's status to "Not Onboarded" and log the action in their history.

logVisit.logVisitNote: Individual/Enterprise visits are used for one-on-one coaching sessions. Group visits are for training sessions with multiple participants. Midline surveys track progress at key milestones.

individualEnterpriseVisit.title: Individual/Enterprise Visit
individualEnterpriseVisit.description: Log a one-on-one visit with the participant or visit to their enterprise

groupVisitForm.title: Group Visit Form
groupVisitForm.description: Log a group session or training attended by multiple participants

midlineSurvey.title: Midline Survey
midlineSurvey.description: Conduct a midline assessment survey to track progress

categoryModal.title: Select Livelihood Category
categoryModal.description: Please select the livelihood category and subcategory for this pathway. This helps track and support the specific business type.
categoryModal.selectedDescription: This information will be used to tailor support and track progress for this specific business type.
